alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 10:34AM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture and other farm lands begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning and continue rising to 13.9 feet Monday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. The magnitude and timing of rises will be impacted by the amount of rain that falls late Thursday into Friday. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 11.5 Thu 9 am 12.4 13.2 13.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 1230 PM CDT.
